00231 int getNumberOfStr( char* str )
00232 {
00233         int cnt = 0;
00234 
00235         if( str == 0 ) return 0;
00236 
00237         size_t len = strlen( str );
00238         size_t i = 0;
00239         size_t pos;
00240 
00241         while( (pos = string::find( str, i )) != string::npos )
00242         {
00243                 i = pos + len;
00244                 cnt++;
00245         }
00246 
00247         return cnt;

00377 StringEx getSubString(size_t posA, size_t posB) const
00378 {
00379         if( posA > string::length() ) return "";
00380         if( posB > string::length() ) posB = string::length();
00381 
00382         if(posA > posB)
00383         {
00384                 size_t temp;
00385                 temp = posA;
00386                 posA = posB;
00387                 posB = temp;
00388         }
00389 
00390         return (StringEx)string::substr( posA, posB - posA );
00391 }

00414 int divideString( StringEx& frontend, StringEx& backend, char delimiter )
00415 {
00416         int pos = this->getIndex( delimiter );
00417 
00418         if( pos < 0 ) 
00419         {
00420                 frontend = *this;
00421                 return 0;
00422         }
00423         else
00424         {
00425                 frontend = this->getSubString( 0, pos );
00426                 backend  = this->getSubString( pos + 1, string::length() );
00427         }
00428         
00429         return 1;
00430 }

00486 void trimLeft()
00487 {
00488         if( isEmpty() ) return ;
00489 
00490         for( size_t i = 0; i < string::length(); i++ )
00491         {
00492                 if( !isspace( string::at(i) & 0xff ) )
00493                 {
00494                         if( i != 0 ) string::erase( 0, i );
00495                         return ;
00496                 }
00497         }
00498 
00499 #if _MSC_VER == 1200
00500     string::erase(begin(), end());
00501 #else
00502         string::clear();
00503 #endif
00504 }
00505 
00506 void trimLeft( char ch )
00507 {
00508         if( isEmpty() ) return ;
00509 
00510         for( size_t i = 0; i < string::length(); i++ )
00511         {
00512                 if( string::at(i) != ch )
00513                 {
00514                         if( i != 0 ) string::erase( 0, i );
00515                         return ;
00516                 }
00517         }
00518 
00519 #if _MSC_VER == 1200
00520     string::erase(begin(), end());
00521 #else
00522         string::clear();
00523 #endif
00524 }
00525 
00526 void trimRight()
00527 {
00528         if( isEmpty() ) return ;
00529 
00530         for( size_t i = string::length() - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00531         {
00532                 if( !isspace( string::at(i) & 0xff ) )
00533                 {
00534                         if( i != (string::length() - 1) ) string::erase( i + 1 );
00535                         return ;
00536                 }
00537         }
00538 
00539 #if _MSC_VER == 1200
00540     string::erase(begin(), end());
00541 #else
00542         string::clear();
00543 #endif
00544 }
00545 
00546 void trimRight( char ch )
00547 {
00548         if( isEmpty() ) return ;
00549 
00550         for( size_t i = string::length() - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00551         {
00552                 if( string::at(i) != ch )
00553                 {
00554                         if( i != (string::length() - 1) ) string::erase( i + 1 );
00555                         return ;
00556                 }
00557         }
00558 
00559 #if _MSC_VER == 1200
00560     string::erase(begin(), end());
00561 #else
00562         string::clear();
00563 #endif
00564 }

00578 int replaceString( char* targetstr, char* str )
00579 {
00580         if( targetstr == 0 || str == 0 || strcmp(targetstr,"") == 0 ) // || strcmp(targetstr,str) == 0 )
00581         {
00582                 return 0;
00583         }
00584 
00585         size_t tlen = strlen( targetstr );
00586         size_t slen = strlen( str );
00587         
00588         int mc  = 0;
00589         int pos = 0;
00590         
00591         while( (pos = getIndex( pos, targetstr )) >= 0 )
00592         {
00593                 string::replace( pos, tlen, str );
00594                 pos = pos + static_cast<int>(slen);
00595                 mc++;
00596         }
00597 
00598         return mc;
00599 }

00601 int replaceCharOneOfChars(char* targetchars, char ch)
00602 {
00603         if( targetchars == 0 || strcmp( targetchars,"" ) == 0 )
00604         {
00605                 return 0;
00606         }
00607 
00608         int mc  = 0;
00609         int pos = 0;
00610 
00611         while( (pos = getIndex2( pos, targetchars )) >= 0 )
00612         {
00613                 string::at(pos) = ch;
00614                 pos = pos + 1;
00615                 mc++;
00616         }       
00617 
00618         return mc;
00619 }

00621 int replaceStringFromAToB(char* A, char* B, char* str, int isIncluded)
00622 {
00623         if(A==0 || B==0 || str==0) return 0;
00624 
00625         size_t posA = 0, posB = 0, pos = 0;
00626         size_t lenA, lenB, mc = 0, tc = 0, len;
00627 
00628         len  = strlen( str );
00629         lenA = strlen( A   );
00630         lenB = strlen( B   );
00631 
00632         if( (lenA == 0) || (lenB == 0) ) return 0;
00633 
00634         while( ((posA = this->getIndex( (int)pos, A )) != string::npos) && ((posB = this->getIndex( (int)(pos + posA), B )) != string::npos) )
00635         {
00636                 if( (posA >= posB) || (posA + lenA >= posB)) return 0;
00637 
00638                 if( !isIncluded )
00639                 {
00640                         posA = posA + lenA;
00641                         tc   = posB - posA;
00642                 }
00643                 else
00644                 {
00645                         tc = posB + lenB - posA;
00646                 }
00647 
00648                 string::replace( posA, tc, str );
00649 
00650                 pos = static_cast<int>(posB + lenB + 1);
00651                 mc++;
00652         }
00653         
00654         return (int)mc;
00655 }

00657 StringEx getStringBetweenAnB( char* A, char* B, int isIncluded )
00658 {
00659         size_t posA = 0, posB = 0;
00660         size_t lenA, lenB, tc = 0;
00661 
00662         if( (A == 0) || (B == 0) ) return "";
00663 
00664         lenA = strlen( A );
00665         lenB = strlen( B );
00666 
00667         if( ((posA = this->getIndex( A )) != string::npos) && ((posB = this->getIndex( (int)(posA + 1), B )) != string::npos) )
00668         {
00669                 if( (posA >= posB) || (posA + lenA >= posB)) return "";
00670 
00671                 if( !isIncluded )
00672                 {
00673                         posA = posA + lenA;
00674                         tc   = posB - posA;
00675                 }
00676                 else
00677                 {
00678                         tc = posB + lenB - posA;
00679                 }
00680 
00681         }
00682 
00683         return this->getSubString( posA, tc );
00684 }

00686 void toLowerCase()
00687 {
00688         string::iterator itr; 
00689 
00690         for( itr = string::begin(); itr != string::end(); itr++ )
00691         {
00692                 *itr = tolower( *itr );
00693         }
00694 }

00696 void toUpperCase()
00697 {
00698         string::iterator itr; 
00699 
00700         for( itr = string::begin(); itr != string::end(); itr++ )
00701         {
00702                 *itr = toupper( *itr );
00703         }

00706 StringEx getValue(char* attr, char* delimiter)
00707 {
00708         int pos = 0;
00709 
00710         if( (attr == 0) || (delimiter == 0) ) return "";
00711 
00712         size_t lenAttr      = strlen( attr );
00713         size_t lenDelimiter = strlen( delimiter );
00714 
00715         while( true )
00716         {
00717                 if( (pos = this->getIndex( pos, attr )) != (int)string::npos )
00718                 {
00719                         int i = 0;
00720                         while( isspace( string::at( pos + lenAttr + i ) ) ) i++;
00721 
00722                         if( string::compare( pos + lenAttr + i, lenDelimiter, delimiter ) == 0 )
00723                         {
00724                                 return &(string::at( pos + lenAttr + i + lenDelimiter + 1 ));
00725                         }
00726                         else
00727                         {
00728                                 pos = pos + static_cast<int>(lenAttr);
00729                         }
00730                 }
00731                 else
00732                 {
00733                         break;
00734                 }
00735         }
00736 
00737         return "";
00738 }

00764 int bitOR( size_t pos, unsigned char operand )
00765 {
00766         if( pos >= string::length() ) return 0;
00767 
00768         string::at( pos ) |= operand;
00769 
00770         return 1;

00772 
00773 int bitAND( size_t pos, unsigned char operand )
00774 {
00775         if( pos >= string::length() ) return 0;
00776 
00777         string::at( pos ) &= operand;
00778 
00779         return 1;
00780 }
